TopicTitle: Bring back Gigantor Solar Panel attachment!

Articles.Content: Why Did they take away the attachment bubble for the gigantor solar panel - I mean, I was using that! It was really useful. I want to raise this so people know how I feel - Comment if you are the same
Wait, when did the Gigantor have an attachment bubble?
I never remember it having one...I wish I knew, that would've been useful.
It should of kept it, Its annoying because when I want to attach it, its not on straight
I thought something was missing when it didn't seem to snap of to the end of cubic octo struts. Wonder why they took it out.
I usually attach them radially to a tail fin or something. But when I need them on the end of a skinny part, it's really hard to get them straight without that end node. Pressing "C" helps, but dang.

c?

What does that do?
...I don't remember anything like that. Did they remove it prior to .20?

No, its been here all the time until 0.21.2, and its a pain that they've removed it

CURSE YE, SQUAD!
Do you have pictures? Anything? Because I never saw anything like that.
No, sorry I don't have any pictures of me putting the gigantors on anything, however, this issue only arose because for a change, I wanted a solar panel ontop of a rocket, which brought on the pains
yeah press c - it locks the parts to the nearest (from memory) 5 degrees when placing, may help

Yea, that kinda helped, its still a pain and really should be put back in (I think)

All in favor, comment
Don't forget that you can downgrade to the previous stable (and therefore restore the old behavior in a personal mod, if you like).
a bubble? do you mean the green bubble when attach?
Agreed, that seems like it'd be a strange thing to do. Perhaps copying the part from an old install will fix the problem.
Oh, you mean not an actual part, but the point where it snaps?

No, its been here all the time until 0.21.2, and its a pain that they've removed it

CURSE YE, SQUAD!

I checked my 0.20.2 install and they didn't have it there either... I too don't remember them ever having the little bubble.
I'm also gonna speak up and say that I don't remember it having a bubble...
Yea the snap point, they removed it from all solar panels, which is a pain is the ***
Just tested this, and I see what you guys are talking about now...

I am sure, solar panels never had this node in the first place. (maybe that was a mod?)

But they totally should have it, that would make things so much easier. I always thought that those panels should be on top of the probe.
I remember the Gigantors having that. I never really used it much but now that you mention it, it really oughta get put back.
Any ideas how to raise this to the devs?

Rhyunix, there is one way...

PROTEST! PETITION! PICKET!
